message: I'll start with a generous offer. Accept and we can split the cash!
I'll give you a slightly better offer. You can't do better than this!
You said I couldn't do better, but I think I can! Take it or leave it!
You're getting desperate, Alice! I'll give you a slightly better offer. Don't pass it up this time!
You're not getting the best out of me yet! Meet me in the middle?
You're getting closer, Alice! But I'm not done yet. I'll give you one more chance to meet me in the middle.
You said I was getting closer, but I think I'm already there! Take it or leave it!
